job_title: Project Manager with FX and Treasury Experience
jd: From: kavyasree, IT America kavyasree@itamerica.com Reply to: kavyasree@itamerica.com Min. 15+ years of experience with good understanding on Financial Services domainMust have experience working in FX, Treasury, Accounting domainsStrong stakeholder management experience and defining program plans, schedules, risk management, budget management etc. for large scale programsDemonstrated experience managing large and complex program implementations with multiple systems involvedExcellent communication skills including verbal, written and non-verbalPrior experience successfully managing multi-million-dollar budgetsPrevious experience working with vendors and 3rd party providersDemonstrated analytical skills that includes problem solving and risk mitigationExcellent negotiation and conflict management skillsDemonstrated experience creating program KPIs (key performance indicators) and managing a programs strengths and areas of improvement against those guidelinesPrior experience managing a team where performance management includes constructive feedback and identifying developmental opportunities to team membersCompetencies: Program Management, Agile Specialization
